name: Krack Out - Strawberry Jam 2017
description:
Breakout-Clone with 5 levels, each level has several dynamic backgrounds. Use your mouse to control the bat. Destroy all bricks to rich the next level. The Manga-Girl undresses while you playing.

This Game was made for the Strawberry Jam 2017.

Version 1.0.1 - Bugfix in Level-Gallery
Version 1.0.0 - Release

Features:
- 5 Levels
- Level-Gallery
- Bonus Bricks like Laser-Bat, Big-Bat and more ...

Difficult: easy
Genre: Casual
Engine: Game Maker Studio

Main-Theme composed by:
Alexander Hilliger

Coding & Rendering:
Hilliger Media

Please report bugs and suggestions to the comments.
